name: Ferocious Feint
text: Through training or inborn ability, the animal is naturally skilled at feinting against its foes.
benefit: The animal companion uses half its master’s class level (minimum 1) in place of its Charisma bonus on Bluff checks to feint an opponent. In addition, the animal companion can use Bluff to feint an opponent as a move action.
text_zh: 透过训练，又或者是生来就有的能力，动物伙伴特别擅长虚晃敌人一招。
benefit_zh: 动物伙伴在进行对敌人使用虚招的唬骗检定时，以主人职业等级的一半（最少1）取代其魅力调整值。此外，动物伙伴可以用移动动作用唬骗对敌人进行虚招。
